podvideos.title:
Spotlight on sickle cell disease:
Clinical complications
podvideos.button_label:
Spotlight on sickle cell disease:
Clinical complications
podvideos.infotext:
Watch Dr Rachel Kesse-Adu, a Consultant Haematologist at Guy’s and St Thomas’ NHS
Foundation Trust, discuss the key unmet needs in sickle cell disease and present case studies
highlighting the clinical complications faced by these patients

podvideos.title:
Talking β-thalassaemia:
Clinical complications
podvideos.infotext:
Watch Dr Emma Drasar, a Consultant Haematologist at The Whittington and University College
Hospitals, discuss the key unmet needs in β-thalassaemia and present a case study that follows a
patient throughout their lifetime, to highlight the clinical complications faced by these patients

podvideos.title:
Holistic considerations in haemoglobinopathies:
Psychological and mental health
podvideos.button_label:
Holistic considerations in haemoglobinopathies:
Psychological and mental health
podvideos.infotext:
Watch Dr Rachel Kesse-Adu, a Consultant Haematologist at Guy’s and St Thomas’ NHS Foundation
Trust, and Dr Kofi Anie MBE, a Consultant Psychologist at London North West University Healthcare
NHS Trust discuss the psychological burden associated with haemoglobinopathies
